Subject: Christofle HO Piece - Insurance Required 
--------------------------------------------------
Hello Hagop, 

Hope all is well. 

I need your assistance in creating insurance for the attached. This item will be used for an event in Dubai on the 9th and 10th of October. Could you please have the insurance covered from the 2nd of October to the 11th of October if possible? We will transfer the item to the event location before the event with a few days.

Let me know if you have any questions. 

Best,
Nesma Shahin.

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C1RR46B_01

No issue.

Best Regards,
Hagop
